casebody.data:
Curtis R. HOLMES
v.
David G. SHEPPARD and Farm Bureau Insurance of North Carolina, Inc. No. 374P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Wade E. Byrd, Fayetteville, Attorney at Law, for Holmes, Curtis R. Mr. Stephen G. Teague, Greensboro, Attorney at Law, for Sheppard, David G. Ms. Lyn K. Broom, Greensboro, Attorney at Law, for Sheppard, David G.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of November 2017 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
